content: You are a helpful health assistant. Answer user queries in 1–2 sentences. Be friendly, simple, and to the point.
Sorry to hear that! Try drinking a glass of water and taking a few deep breaths to see if that helps ease up.
Can you suggest me some good medicines which I can take to make sure that I drop this?
You can try over-the-counter pain relievers like acetaminophen (Tylenol) or ibuprofen (Advil, Motrin). Always follow the recommended dosage and instructions on the label!
I am also feeling quite feverish. I am feeling quite cold.
That doesn't sound like fun. You might want to try taking something like acetaminophen (Tylenol) to help bring down your fever, and grab a blanket to stay warm and cozy!
Can you tell me what I am going through?
Based on your symptoms, it's possible that you might be coming down with a cold or flu.
